FuncDef: The display mpls rsvp-te p2mp session command displays information about RSVP P2MP sessions.

ParaDef.Info:
Ingress LSR ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the ID of a P2MP RSVP-TE tunnel.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Displays information about a P2MP RSVP-TE session with a specified P2MP ID.
The value is a hexadecimal integer ranging from 0 to FFFFFFFF.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After P2MP TE is enabled, the display mpls rsvp-te p2mp session command can be run to display information about all or specified RSVP P2MP sessions of RSVP-TE signaling.
